1604067330_mirrored_slrslr_github.body:
Hmm... Maybe I'm not right, but I think you should try python3.

-----Original Message-----
From: "slrslr" <notifications@github.com>
Sent: ‎5/‎11/‎2019 5:14 PM
To: "HelloZeroNet/ZeroNet" <ZeroNet@noreply.github.com>
Cc: "Subscribed" <subscribed@noreply.github.com>
Subject: [HelloZeroNet/ZeroNet] Can not recognize gevent and says"ImportError: No module named sysconfig" (#2014)

Today, i have downloaded zeronet master package (i think revision 3864) to my Linux CentOS 6.10 but it complains about gevent:
[root@0 ZeroNet-master]# easy_install gevent
Searching for gevent
Best match: gevent 1.1rc3
Adding gevent 1.1rc3 to easy-install.pth file

Using /usr/lib64/python2.6/site-packages
Processing dependencies for gevent
Finished processing dependencies for gevent
[root@0 ZeroNet-master]# python2.7 zeronet.py
- Starting ZeroNet...
ERROR:root:Unhandled exception: No module named gevent
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "zeronet.py", line 18, in main
    import main
  File "/home/ZeroNet-master/src/main.py", line 9, in <module>
    import gevent
ImportError: No module named gevent
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "zeronet.py", line 88, in <module>
    main()
  File "zeronet.py", line 53, in main
    traceback.print_exc(file=open(config.log_dir + "/error.log", "a"))
AttributeError: 'Config' object has no attribute 'log_dir'
[root@0 ZeroNet-master]# which pip
/usr/bin/pip
[root@0 ZeroNet-master]# /usr/bin/pip install gevent
You are using pip version 7.1.0, however version 19.1.1 is available.
You should consider upgrading via the 'pip install --upgrade pip' command.
Requirement already satisfied (use --upgrade to upgrade): gevent in /usr/lib64/python2.6/site-packages
Requirement already satisfied (use --upgrade to upgrade): greenlet>=0.4.9 in /usr/lib64/python2.6/site-packages (from gevent)
[root@0 ZeroNet-master]# /usr/bin/pip install gevent --upgrade
You are using pip version 7.1.0, however version 19.1.1 is available.
You should consider upgrading via the 'pip install --upgrade pip' command.
Collecting gevent
  Using cached https://files.pythonhosted.org/packages/ed/27/6c49b70808f569b66ec7fac2e78f076e9b204db9cf5768740cff3d5a07ae/gevent-1.4.0.tar.gz
    Complete output from command python setup.py egg_info:
    Traceback (most recent call last):
      File "<string>", line 20, in <module>
      File "/root/tmp/pip-build-mgqKsV/gevent/setup.py", line 7, in <module>
        import sysconfig
    ImportError: No module named sysconfig

    ----------------------------------------
Command "python setup.py egg_info" failed with error code 1 in /root/tmp/pip-build-mgqKsV/gevent
If you do not know the cause and is unrelated, please close this.
—
You are receiving this because you are subscribed to this thread.
Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub, or mute the thread.

And pip3 to install dependencies.
